CatDescriptText: Samuel Carr, 4634 Sylvan Avenue, Beltzhoover, was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Up" column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 2, 1957, pg. 2, with question: "Do you believe that one political party should be in control of all the offices in city, county, and state?" answer reads: "I don't think so. The more different heads that get together, the better ideas come out."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Samuel Carr wearing flecked coat with upturned collar, narrowly striped shirt, fedora, and moustache, posed in front of brick building
